Posts.Content: Jul 2, 2008 01:12AM Rosalyn wrote: I have been recommended to have my ovaries removed and my onc. tells me that I will not require any ongoing hormone treatment afterwards.  Like Dani, I was not aware of Tamox and Arimedex so like you I am interested to find out more about on going treatment after surgery.  My onc. told me that a full hysterectomy has different needs to an oophorectomey (just the removal of the ovaries) so if there is anyone who has had just their overies removed and can give me feedback on the longer term requirments after surgery I would love to hear from you.
